### 08/2025 First version of BCFTools pipeline for eDNA metabarcoding

#### Data acquistion

Organize all fastq files of each run in a single folder

```{bash}
#
mkdir -p \
~/projetos/analises/bcftools_pipe/reads/run_01mar21/fastq/all \
~/projetos/analises/bcftools_pipe/reads/run_09fev21/fastq/all \
~/projetos/analises/bcftools_pipe/reads/run_29jul20/fastq/all
```

Move all fastq files to a single folder

```{bash}
for run in run_01mar21 run_09fev21 run_29jul20; do
  cp /home/heron/runs/$run/fastq/all/*fastq.gz \
  ~/projetos/analises/bcftools_pipe/reads/$run/fastq/all/
done
```
